reviewText: Produced in association with verterinarians and professional breeding farms.  Details the care of the pregnant mare, innoculations, diet, foaling facilities and equipment, vet care, diagnosing impending delivery, safty precautions, all aspects of post-natal care.  See a live "textbook" foaling, depicting all stages of labor and delivery & proper role of the owner/midwife.  Red Alert delivery situations are diagrammed and solutions discussed.  Includes steps to take to avoid rejected foals.  Needed fundamentals you need as a novice breeder and for the experienced, serves as a useful & invaluable reference.
